segments.text: Can I borrow this magazine from you ? It's really interesting and I can't put it down .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am sorry , but I can't lend it to you now , for I haven't finished reading it . If you don't mind , I can lend you some back numbers to you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That would be very kind of you . By the way , is it a monthly magazine ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , it is a fortnightly . So , you see , I can get the new one quite soon .
segments.speaker: S2
